title: Ticket #2313: Cannot use transfer_output_remaps on directories
description:
If you've specified a directory in transfer_output_files to make use of recursive transfers, you can NOT put the directory name in your transfer_output_remaps. You CAN put individual files. This should be called out in the condor_submit man page. 

  # subdir is a subdirectory created by the job and filled with files
  transfer_output_files=subdir
  # This will not work:
  transfer_output_remap=subdir=newpath
  # This does work:
  transfer_output_remap=subdir/file1=newfile1
check_ins:
2011-Aug-16 16:51   Check-in [26807]: Elaborate on the fact that transfer_output_remaps only works for files but not directories (#2313) (By Cathrin Weiss )
2011-Aug-16 16:45   Check-in [26805]: Elaborate on the fact that transfer_output_remaps only works for files but not directories (#2313) (By Cathrin Weiss )
